title: (x) House signpainter script - House Slant {Edward Maddison}
content:
hi all

i actually thought this was one of house industries signpainter fonts, but I couldnt find it,  
i know its as common as muck....

thanks so much in advance...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100906092809im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2005110058546623118_rs_4236.jpg)
author: rich

comments.content:
Actually I think it is Sign Painter HouseBrush with a stroke around it to make it bolder.

EDIT: Upon closer inspection, there's some serious skewing involved as well. And the H isn't the same as HouseBrush's H.
This is House slant, it is a house industries free font i believe

if you fill this in it will be yours!  
 [https://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=catalog](http://web.archive.org/web/20100906092809/https:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=catalog "https://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=catalog")
Well, that would explain it, I don't have House Slant.
